sentences.sentence: Inquiries on this matter are being redirected to the press office.
sentences.translation: 询问此事的信件一律转到新闻处。

sentences.sentence: I have failed to reach them by postal inquiries.
sentences.translation: 我未能通过邮政查询与他们取得联系。

sentences.sentence: Inquiries flooded in from all over the world.
sentences.translation: 问询从世界各地如潮水般涌来。
